mapper.select: select h.h_no, h.h_fare, h.h_type, h.h_livetype, h.h_thumnail ,b.b_no from house h , basket b where h.h_no = b.h_no and b.m_id = #{m_id} order by b.b_no asc
mapper.update: update member set m_pass=#{m_pass}, m_phone=#{m_phone} where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.delete: update member set m_dropdate = (sysdate+29) where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.select: select r.r_no, h.h_no, r.r_startdate, r.r_enddate, r.r_fare, r.r_peoplecnt, h.h_thumnail, h.m_phone from house h, reservation r where h.h_no = r.h_no and r.m_id = #{m_id}
select h.h_thumnail, r.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_phone, r.r_startdate, r.r_enddate, r.r_peoplecnt from house h, reservation r, member m where h.h_no = r.h_no and h.m_id = #{m_id} and r.m_id = m.m_id
select h.h_thumnail, r.r_startdate, r.r_enddate, r.m_id, m.m_name, r.r_no from house h, reservation r, member m where h.h_no = r.h_no and r.m_id = m.m_id and r.m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.update: update member set m_score= m_score+#{m_score}, m_scorecnt=m_scorecnt+1 where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.insert: insert into member_grade(r_no, m_id, g_score) values (#{r_no}, #{m_id}, #{g_score})
